name: shelfquest-app
description: ShelfQuest - A comprehensive digital library application with AI-powered features

scripts.preinstall: node -e "const ua=process.env.npm_config_user_agent||''; const ep=process.env.npm_execpath||''; if(!/pnpm/i.test(ua) && !/pnpm/i.test(ep)){console.error('This repository uses pnpm. Please run:'); console.error('  corepack enable && pnpm install'); process.exit(1)}"
scripts.test:all: pnpm run test:client && pnpm run test:server && pnpm run test:ai-service
scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm run dev:client" "pnpm run dev:server" "pnpm run dev:ai-service"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter client2 run build && pnpm --filter server2 run build
scripts.start: concurrently "pnpm run start:client" "pnpm run start:server" "pnpm run start:ai-service"
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd ai-service && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:test-deps: cd client2 && pnpm install && cd ../server2 && pnpm install && cd ../ai-service && pip install -r requirements-test.txt
scripts.setup: pnpm run install:all && pnpm run install:test-deps
